WorkflowInfo.Name: Conditional Wait with Parallel Branches (BATCH EXECUTION EXAMPLE)
WorkflowInfo.XML: <SequentialWorkflowActivity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" x:Name="CustomWorkflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <CreateMemoryTable x:Name="createMemoryTable1" activityLicenseType="1" id="291" name="CreateMemoryTable" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Create Memory Table" Description="Creates a table and saves it to the workflow memory" TableName="serverTable" ColumnNumber="1" RowNumber="9" TableAsString="<NewDataSet> <xs:schema id='NewDataSet' xmlns='' xmlns:xs='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' xmlns:msdata='urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata'> <xs:element name='NewDataSet' msdata:IsDataSet='true' msdata:MainDataTable='resultSet' msdata:UseCurrentLocale='true'> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice minOccurs='0' maxOccurs='unbounded'> <xs:element name='resultSet'> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name='serverName' type='xs:string' minOccurs='0' /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> <resultSet><serverName>host1</serverName></resultSet><resultSet><serverName>host2</serverName></resultSet><resultSet><serverName>host3</serverName></resultSet><resultSet><serverName>host4</serverName></resultSet><resultSet><serverName>host5</serverName></resultSet><resultSet><serverName>host6</serverName></resultSet><resultSet><serverName>host7</serverName></resultSet><resultSet><serverName>host8</serverName></resultSet><resultSet><serverName>host9</serverName></resultSet> </NewDataSet>" isEmptyGrid="0" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" label="Create Memory Table" description="Creates a table and saves it to the workflow memory" notes="" /> <GetRowsCount x:Name="rowCount" activityLicenseType="1" id="287" name="GetRowsCount" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" TypeName="GetRowsCount" label="Get Rows Count" notes="" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" Description="Counts the number of rows in a table" ResultSet="%serverTable%" description="Counts the number of rows in a table" /> <FunctionCalculator x:Name="branchExecutions" activityLicenseType="1" id="198" name="FunctionCalculator" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Function Calculator" Description="Performs various calculations on variables" Formula="%rowCount% / 3" TypeName="FunctionCalculator" /> <ParallelActivity x:Name="parallelActivity1" activityLicenseType="1" id="440" name="ParallelActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" label="ParallelActivity" notes=""> <SequenceActivity x:Name="parallelBranch_ONE" id="{x:Null}" name="SequenceActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" label="SequenceActivity" description="Executes the activities following this branch" notes=""> <WhileActivity x:Name="currentRow_BRANCH_ONE" activityLicenseType="1" id="432" name="WhileActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" label="WhileActivity" notes=""> <SequenceActivity x:Name="whileSequenceActivity1"> <ExitWhile name="ExitWhile" Counter="%branchExecutions%" exitWhileInsideWhile="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" isValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" whileSequenceActivity="whileSequenceActivity1" /> <GetCellValue x:Name="serverName_BRANCH_ONE" activityLicenseType="1" id="276" name="GetCellValue" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Cell Value" Description="Retrieves a cell's value according to its location in a table" ResultSet="%serverTable%" ResultSetName="serverTable" RowNumber="%currentRow_BRANCH_ONE%" ColumnType="Number" ColumnNumber="1" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <MemorySet x:Name="setBranchComplete_1" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="branchComplete_1" VariableValue="yes" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" label="Set Memory" description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" notes="" /> <Terminate x:Name="terminateBranch_1" activityLicenseType="1" id="436" name="Terminate" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" TargetModuleID="0" TargetModuleName="" TerminationReason="Branch 1 complete." TypeName="Terminate" label="Terminate" notes="" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Terminate" Description="Terminates the current branch in the current Workflow, even if it is the only branch" description="Terminates the current branch in the current Workflow, even if it is the only branch" /> </SequenceActivity> <SequenceActivity x:Name="parallelBranch_TWO" id="{x:Null}" name="SequenceActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" label="SequenceActivity" description="Executes the activities following this branch" notes="" isDefault="True"> <WhileActivity x:Name="currentRow_BRANCH_TWO" activityLicenseType="1" id="432" name="WhileActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" label="WhileActivity" notes=""> <SequenceActivity x:Name="whileSequenceActivity2"> <ExitWhile name="ExitWhile" Counter="%branchExecutions%" exitWhileInsideWhile="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" isValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" whileSequenceActivity="whileSequenceActivity2" /> <FunctionCalculator x:Name="currentRow_BRANCH_TWO_ADJUSTED" activityLicenseType="1" id="198" name="FunctionCalculator" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Function Calculator" Description="Performs various calculations on variables" Cell Value" Description="Retrieves a cell's value according to its location in a table" ResultSet="%serverTable%" ResultSetName="serverTable" RowNumber="%currentRow_BRANCH_TWO_ADJUSTED%" ColumnType="Number" ColumnNumber="1" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <MemorySet x:Name="setBranchComplete_2" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="branchComplete_2" VariableValue="yes" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" label="Set Memory" description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" notes="" /> <Terminate x:Name="terminateBranch_2" activityLicenseType="1" id="436" name="Terminate" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" TargetModuleID="0" TargetModuleName="" TerminationReason="Branch 2 complete." TypeName="Terminate" label="Terminate" notes="" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Terminate" Description="Terminates the current branch in the current Workflow, even if it is the only branch" description="Terminates the current branch in the current Workflow, even if it is the only branch" /> </SequenceActivity> <SequenceActivity x:Name="parallelBranch_THREE" id="{x:Null}" name="SequenceActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" label="SequenceActivity" notes="" isDefault="True"> <WhileActivity x:Name="currentRow_BRANCH_THREE" activityLicenseType="1" id="432" name="WhileActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" label="WhileActivity" notes=""> <SequenceActivity x:Name="whileSequenceActivity3"> <ExitWhile name="ExitWhile" Counter="%branchExecutions%" exitWhileInsideWhile="True" x:Name="exitWhile3" isValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" whileSequenceActivity="whileSequenceActivity3" /> <FunctionCalculator x:Name="currentRow_BRANCH_THREE_ADJUSTED" activityLicenseType="1" id="198" name="FunctionCalculator" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TypeName="FunctionCalculator" /> <GetCellValue x:Name="serverName_BRANCH_THREE" activityLicenseType="1" id="276" name="GetCellValue" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" Description="Retrieves a cell's value according to its location in a table" ResultSet="%serverTable%" ResultSetName="serverTable" RowNumber="%currentRow_BRANCH_THREE_ADJUSTED%" ColumnType="Number" ColumnNumber="1" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <MemorySet x:Name="setBranchComplete_3" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="branchComplete_3" VariableValue="yes" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" label="Set Memory" description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" notes="" /> </SequenceActivity> </ParallelActivity> <ConditionalWait x:Name="waitForBranchesToFinish" activityLicenseType="1" id="329" name="ConditionalWait" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Conditional Wait" Description="Puts the Workflow on hold until a specified condition applies" Condition=""%branchComplete_1%" = "yes" AND "%branchComplete_2%" = "yes" AND "%branchComplete_3%" = "yes"" MaxTimeout="False" isDefault="0" TimeInterval="" TimeValue="" TypeName="ConditionalWait" label="Conditional Wait" description="Puts the Workflow on hold until a specified condition applies" notes="" /> <DisplayValue x:Name="displayCompletionMessage" activityLicenseType="1" id="431" name="DisplayValue" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="DisplayValue" Description="Displays an eyeShare variable value in the active logs" ValueToDisplay="All branches have finished their execution." TypeName="DisplayValue" label="DisplayValue" description="Displays an eyeShare variable value in the active logs" notes="" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
